results.title: Trump Asks Judge to Keep Blocking F.B.I. From Working With Seized Classified Files

results.title: Morgan Wallen’s Career Seemed Over. Now He’s Broken a Billboard Record.
results.abstract: The country singer was rebuked by the music industry after using a racial slur. Still, “Dangerous: The Double Album” has logged 86 weeks in the Top 10 of Billboard’s 200 chart.

media.caption: Morgan Wallen has beaten the 1964 record set by the folk trio Peter, Paul and Mary for the longest Top 10 run for an album by a single artist.
media.copyright: Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images

results.title: Man Sentenced After 12 Years of Threats to an Actress and Her Daughter
results.abstract: Eva LaRue, an actress known for her roles on “CSI: Miami” and “All My Children,” said her family lived in fear. James David Rogers, 58, was sentenced to just over three years.

media.caption: Prosecutors in a sentencing memorandum described what the actress Eva LaRue and her family endured as a “campaign of torment.”
media.copyright: Michael Tran/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
